transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ji sir, good evening.
Customer: Good evening sir.
Executive: Ankur sir baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Ji ji Ankur baat kar raha hun, Sunil ji boliye.
Executive: Haan Ankur Ankur sir Sunil baat kar raha hun IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan haan haan, chaliye chaliye.
Executive: Ji ji sir aapka actually abhi ek request aaya tha video meeting ke liye shayad aapne interest show kiya tha.
Customer: Ji ji ji ji.
Executive: To sir abhi kab connect karenge abhi? Abhi free hai to abhi connect kar lete hain.
Customer: Ek minute dijiye main dekh leta hun, line pe rahiye.
Executive: Ji ji.

(silence)

Customer: Hello Sunil ji.
Executive: Ji haan sir.
Customer: Aap link share kar dijiye abhi kar lenge.
Executive: Achcha achcha theek hai. To yahi mail rahega na apna jo registered hai yahan pe, jlistone.
Customer: Haan haan haan, usi usi pe bhej dijiye.
Executive: Theek hai. Aap join kare sir aur Mahesh sir bhi rahenge kya?
Customer: Nahi nahi abhi dusre hai Mahesh ji to chote brother hai. Hai jo abhi IndiaMART ko samajhna chah rahe hain. Kaise usko optimum tarike se use karna hai wo sari cheeze ek bar aap unko detail mein bata dijiyega zero se.
Executive: Haan haan.
Customer: Theek hai? To us cheez ke liye hai.
Executive: Achcha achcha okay.
Executive: Haan better rahega sir aur agar executive wagera aur bhi hai to wo log bhi join kar lenge to aap rahiye hai na discussion wagera bhi ho jayega and renewal wagera ke liye bhi sir mam baat karna chah rahe the aapse to Jinnsi mam ha Jinnsi mam ko bhi main ek bar wo ek bar bata dijiye last mein join kar lenge usme.
Executive: Haan haan sir. Theek hai na complete kar lijiye last mein ek bar aa jayenge.
Customer: Ji ji sir ek minute dijiye ga mujhe please.
Executive: Done.

(silence)

Customer: Achcha.

(silence)

Executive: Ankur sir ek bar check kijiyega.

(silence)

Customer: Aa gayi? Aa gaya mail?
Executive: Hello.
Executive: Ji ji haan sir maine dekhiye mail ka mail bhej diya hai.
Customer: Aa gaya aa gaya.
Executive: Haan haan to sir connect kar lijiyega.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai kar rahe hain.

(silence)

Customer: Theek hai join kar rahe hain na?
Executive: Ji ji sir aap join kar lijiye main main already join kar chuka hun yahan pe.
Customer: Theek hai.

(silence)
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer requested a video meeting.

- Wants to understand how to use IndiaMART.

- Renewal discussion with Jinnsi mam.



Resolution:

- Executive agreed to connect for a video meeting.

- Executive will explain IndiaMART usage to customer.

- Jinnsi mam will join the meeting later.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meeting, subscription, renewal, indiamart usage
